org.lindbergframework.persistence.sql
Interface DataSetMetaDada

public interface DataSetMetaDada

interface that defines the contract for data set meta data implementations.

Author:
Victor Lindberg

getTargetMetaData

java.lang.Object getTargetMetaData()
Get the real target meta data object from this meta data. Target meta data object is the object that represents the final meta data.

Type Parameters:
E - expected type.
Returns:
object that represents the final meta data.
